articles.title: Georgia Holt, actress and Cher's mother, dies age 96 - CNN
articles.description: Cher is mourning the loss of her mother, Georgia Holt, who has died at the age of 96.
articles.content:
Cher is mourning the loss of her mother, Georgia Holt, who has died at the age of 96.
The legendary singer posted on Twitter at the weekend, Mom is gone, alongside a sad-face emoji.

articles.title: Like Celine Dion, Pennsylvania man is fighting Stiff Person Syndrome 'with everything I have’ - Fox News
articles.description: Celine Dion recently announced she has SPS, or Stiff Person Syndrome. A Pennsylvania resident told Fox News Digital that he, too, suffers from the rare disease — and revealed details.

articles.description: The card includes a photo of the King and Queen Consort at the Braemar Royal Highland Gathering on September 3rd, five days before the Queen died on September 8th.
